Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System - Tigecycline (0.0313-4 μg/mL) GP
BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent Tigecycline (0.0313-4 μg/mL) - Gram-positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System - Tigecycline addition for Gram-positive antimicrobial susceptibility testing
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of most Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria isolates from pure culture, specifically for Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus, using Tigecycline on Gram-positive ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels.
